overview: They used to tell stories about a fucking man who saved the universe. A man who sent fucking aliens running home pissing their pants. A man who disappeared without a trace... When the Alien Clowns came back to Earth they were pissed as shit. They fucked our world up. But they made one very big mistake... they should have never fucked with our chicks... It's time for Duke to kick some ass and fuck some whores.
title: Duke Fuckem
